# Demonstrate that long numerical fields mis-match when the low bits are set
# differently in values greater than 53 bits wide.

! runValidation config.json datastream golden.json obtained.json false
! stdout .
! stderr 'failed to verify: test case failed: Expected results are different from actual ones'

-- config.json --
{"numeric_keyword_fields":"testfield"}
-- golden.json --
{
    "expected": [
        {
            "testfield": 9223372036854774000
        }
    ]
}
-- golden.json-expected.json --
{
    "expected": [
        {
            "testfield": 9223372036854774000
        }
    ]
}
-- obtained.json --
{
    "events": [
        {
            "testfield": 9223372036854773807
        }
    ]
}
-- datastream/fields/fields.yml --
- name: testfield
  type: long
  description: |
    Contains long values.
